$description: Tooltip component tokens. Tooltips provide contextual information on hover or focus. These tokens compose primitive tokens into tooltip-specific configurations. Use tooltips for: icon-only button labels, abbreviated text expansion, additional context without cluttering UI. ACCESSIBILITY: Tooltips must be accessible via keyboard focus (not just hover). Never put essential information solely in tooltips.

horizontal.$description: Horizontal padding inside tooltip (12px). Provides comfortable reading space for short text.

vertical.$description: Vertical padding inside tooltip (8px). Compact vertical padding keeps tooltip visually lightweight.

borderRadius.$description: Tooltip border radius (4px). Subtle rounding softens the tooltip without appearing overly styled.

fontSize.$description: Tooltip font size (12px). Smaller than body text to indicate secondary/supplementary information.

fontWeight.$description: Tooltip font weight. Medium weight ensures readability at small font size.

lineHeight.$description: Tooltip line height. Compact line height for single-line or short multi-line tooltips.

maxWidth.$description: Maximum tooltip width (300px). Prevents tooltips from becoming too wide. Content wraps at this width.

shadow.$description: Tooltip shadow. Subtle elevation separates tooltip from underlying content.

zIndex.$description: Tooltip z-index. Ensures tooltip floats above other page content.

size.$description: Tooltip arrow size (7px). Small arrow points toward the trigger element for visual connection.

duration.$description: Tooltip transition duration (100ms). Fast appearance prevents perceived lag when hovering.

easing.$description: Tooltip transition easing. Smooth deceleration for natural tooltip appearance.

offset.$description: Tooltip offset from trigger element (8px). Space between trigger and tooltip prevents visual collision.
